Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the time frame for the implementation of contracts with not-for-profit corporations
Summary: Reduces the number of days for a state agency to register contracts with not-for-profit organizations to thirty; defines registered contract.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the time frame for the implementation of contracts with not-for-profit corporations
